    • This is the Continuous Integration Build of the Open mHealth to FHIR Implementation Guide, based on FHIR Version 3.0.1. See the Directory of published versions

    XML Format: ValueSet-body-posture

    Download Raw xml 

    
<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="body-posture"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>Body Posture</h2><div><p>The posture of the subject (for example, during a clinical measurement). This value set is not exhaustive.</p>
</div><p><b>Copyright Statement:</b> Open mHealth copyright 2015, a project of the Tides Center. All Rights Reserved. This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.</p><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include these codes as defined in <a href="http://www.snomed.org/"><code>http://snomed.info/sct</code></a><table class="none"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&amp;conceptId1=33586001">33586001</a></td><td>sitting</td><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&amp;conceptId1=102538003">102538003</a></td><td>lying down</td><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&amp;conceptId1=10904000">10904000</a></td><td>standing</td><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&amp;conceptId1=272580008">272580008</a></td><td>semi-recumbent</td><td/></tr></table></li></ul></div>
  </text>
  <url value="http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/ValueSet/body-posture"/>
  <version value="0.0.0"/>
  <name value="body-posture"/>
  <title value="Body Posture"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2018-04-28T08:55:00-07:00"/>
  <publisher value="Open mHealth"/>
  <contact>
    <telecom>
      <system value="url"/>
      <value value="http://www.openmhealth.org/"/>
    </telecom>
  </contact>
  <description
               value="The posture of the subject (for example, during a clinical measurement). This value set is not exhaustive."/>
  <immutable value="false"/>
  <copyright
             value="Open mHealth copyright 2015, a project of the Tides Center. All Rights Reserved. This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement."/>
  <compose>
    <include>
      <system value="http://snomed.info/sct"/>
      <concept>
        <code value="33586001"/>
        <display value="sitting"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="102538003"/>
        <display value="lying down"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="10904000"/>
        <display value="standing"/>
      </concept>
      <concept>
        <code value="272580008"/>
        <display value="semi-recumbent"/>
      </concept>
    </include>
  </compose>
</ValueSet>
